00010 public abstract class Field<T>
00011 {
00012         protected T data;
00013         private String name; // Name is the name that is visible by the end-user
00014         private String shortName; // Short name is the name that is used internally
00015         protected String operator;
00016         private Boolean hidden = false;
00017         private Boolean readOnly = false;
00018         private Boolean isNaturalKey = false;
00019         private Boolean isDynamicField = false;
00020         private FieldValidator<T> validator;

00022         private Fields fieldsRef = null;
00023         private boolean isColored = false;

00031                 // on ne doit pas pouvoir initialiser un Field sans son name et

00033         }

00043         {
00044                 this(name, shortName, null);
00045         }

00054         public Field(String name, String shortName, T data)
00055 
00056         {
00057 
00058                 this.name = name;
00059                 // TODO: validate that shortName are really shortName
00060                 this.shortName = shortName;
00061                 this.data = data;
00062                 setOperator("=");
00063                 setValidator(new FieldValidator<T>()
00064                 {
00065                         public boolean valide(T value, Fields entityFields)
00066                         {
00067                                 return true;
00068                         }
00069                 });
00070         }

00109         {
00110                 return getDataString(false);
00111         }

00119         public String getDataString(Boolean forOrm)
00120         {
00121                 if (calcul != null)
00122                         data = calcul.calculate(fieldsRef);
00123                 if (data == null)
00124                         return "";
00125                 if (forOrm)
00126                         return addSlash(data.toString());
00127                 return data.toString();
00128         }
00129 
00133         public T getData()
00134         {
00135                 if (calcul != null)
00136                         return calcul.calculate(fieldsRef);
00137                 return data;
00138         }
00139 
00143         protected void setDataType(T data)
00144         {
00145                 if (validator.isValide(data, fieldsRef))
00146                         this.data = data;
00147                 else
00148                         fieldsRef.setErrorState(true);
00149         }

00302         public boolean equals(Object obj)
00303         {
00304                 if (this == obj)
00305                         return true;
00306                 if (obj == null)
00307                         return false;
00308                 if (!(obj instanceof Field<?>))
00309                         return false;
00310                 Field<?> other = (Field<?>) obj;
00311                 if (data == null)
00312                 {
00313                         if (other.data != null)
00314                                 return false;
00315                 }
00316                 else if (!data.equals(other.data))
00317                         return false;
00318                 if (hidden == null)
00319                 {
00320                         if (other.hidden != null)
00321                                 return false;
00322                 }
00323                 else if (!hidden.equals(other.hidden))
00324                         return false;
00325                 if (isDynamicField == null)
00326                 {
00327                         if (other.isDynamicField != null)
00328                                 return false;
00329                 }
00330                 else if (!isDynamicField.equals(other.isDynamicField))
00331                         return false;
00332                 if (isNaturalKey == null)
00333                 {
00334                         if (other.isNaturalKey != null)
00335                                 return false;
00336                 }
00337                 else if (!isNaturalKey.equals(other.isNaturalKey))
00338                         return false;
00339                 if (name == null)
00340                 {
00341                         if (other.name != null)
00342                                 return false;
00343                 }
00344                 else if (!name.equals(other.name))
00345                         return false;
00346                 if (operator == null)
00347                 {
00348                         if (other.operator != null)
00349                                 return false;
00350                 }
00351                 else if (!operator.equals(other.operator))
00352                         return false;
00353                 if (readOnly == null)
00354                 {
00355                         if (other.readOnly != null)
00356                                 return false;
00357                 }
00358                 else if (!readOnly.equals(other.readOnly))
00359                         return false;
00360                 if (shortName == null)
00361                 {
00362                         if (other.shortName != null)
00363                                 return false;
00364                 }
00365                 else if (!shortName.equals(other.shortName))
00366                         return false;
00367                 return true;
